channel.title: Something new, please?
channel.description:
EDIT: Getting some proof of ability at this very moment.
As we are all aware, there is a veritable plethora of poorly woven servers. Don't get me wrong, there are many who have positively contributed, but often these contributions go to waste, as they are (in terms of snippets and tutorials) crammed into otherwise badly crafted servers, which, in turn are washed away in a sea of the same.
This is what makes those who know what they're doing so much more special.
And this is why I was thinking- why not gather the greatest minds of RSPS development, and provide for them a haven, where collaboration is unfettered by the endless waves of noobs, and new and exciting systems may be born?
Ultimately, I am hoping that borne on the success of the venture, there will be a renewed vigour in the development of quality RS private server mechanisms, (excuse any erroneous terminology) and hopefully, a true, new era.
At this moment, there's no [i]public[/i] site for this... collective, if you will. If any interest is expressed, I will continue its development and get something started.
[b]Some notes so you don't flame me. Well, please don't anyway. Actually, I will get flamed anyway, because I can't reach you.[/b]
[ul][li]I understand that these people will not always be willing to just hand out the code.[/li] [li]I know that this is probably stupid, but I'm bored and thought that it may be a good idea.[/li] [li]I am aware of the billion reasons why it probably won't work.[/li] [li]I used some tricky words and got criticised for it, sweet. [/li][li]I hope you enjoy my 'optimism' ;D[/li][/ul]

item.title: Something new, please?
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

What I mean is he’s not like ‘amazing’ like everybody thinks but instead just an average joe

And I hate rumours, I only bought one thing off scu which was his 474 that had glitched combat, cannons, and agility -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Something new, please?
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:25, topic:367900”][quote author=Aeronity link=topic=464046.msg3394834#msg3394834 date=1289260234]

He said he wants to get the greatest minds of RSPS together.

If anyone among these forums are good at programming, they would write their own base, not join a beginner who has no clue what he/she is doing.
Or they would move away from RSPS, and develop their own game/programs in general.

He was probably exaggerating a bit. Hes obviously not going to get blakeman, graham, peter, scu11 and everyone else all together, and how do you know he is a beginner that doesn’t know what he is doing?
[/quote]Scu is a noob just so you know[/quote]

Didn’t you buy your server from him?

Read full topic

item.title: Something new, please?
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:23, topic:367900”][quote author=Aeronity link=topic=464046.msg3395571#msg3395571 date=1289339934]

Well, from his join date, which was two days ago, and his post count only being six, I doubt he’s been on these forums for a while.

That doesn’t really mean anything, Ive just recently joined these forums myself because this community is thought to be the home of the idiots.
[/quote]How is MoparScape home of the idiots?

This doesn’t mean he knows anything about Java, but why would any aspiring programmer want to keep developing stolen ideas?

What stolen ideas?

RuneScape Private Servers.
It was, and is, JaGeX’s idea.
Why would anyone, who aspires to be a programmer, or game designer, continually to develop something created by someone else?

Why not move on to bigger things, or better things for that matter?

What lol.

Why would anyone capable of being one of the ‘greatest minds of RSPS’ stay on RSPS?
If they have that much knowledge, they could easily create their own game.[/quote]
Because a lot of new comers come here.

To learn from, in a fun way. Also to help the communitys.

Ask the ‘greatest minds of RSPS’?

Read full topic

item.title: Something new, please?
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:15, topic:367900”][quote author=Exitus Interactive link=topic=464046.msg3394227#msg3394227 date=1289180991]
I will enable an application system soon; if I were to implement a forum based one such as most of the others have, they would be available for the rest of the community to see, and we know how it’s awkward both touting yourself around in front of everyone, and when everyone disagrees (as stated by EmulousGuru)- therefore I’m going to make a more private one.
[/quote]
You’re going to make a more private application, so people classify themselves as elitists, and you determine who joins, and who doesn’t?

What gives you the authority to judge any other member of the community?[/quote]

Because there applying for his project?

Read full topic

item.title: Something new, please?
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Exitus Interactive:

I will enable an application system soon; if I were to implement a forum based one such as most of the others have, they would be available for the rest of the community to see, and we know how it’s awkward both touting yourself around in front of everyone, and when everyone disagrees (as stated by EmulousGuru)- therefore I’m going to make a more private one.

You’re going to make a more private application, so people classify themselves as elitists, and you determine who joins, and who doesn’t?

What gives you the authority to judge any other member of the community?

If you want an ‘amazing server’ to prevail, then start learning about programming, not just Java.
Take some C# classes, or Netty/Mina classes to learn about the networking.

Read full topic
